archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0828
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Fraud Manager I want the ability to suspend or block accounts for anyone identified as a fraudster or a victim of fraud

properties.value: this could be the same process as used in case of collection process. Different operations available for fraudster and victim. Some high level details to be provided by VF. OOTB processes in the area as Suspend product or Block SIM Card.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
